Key Match Events: Egypt fought back from behind twice to draw 2-2 with Ghana at the Africa Cup of Nations
Three goals were scored in the space of five minutes and 10 seconds
Omar Marmoush scored the equalizing goal for Egypt after a calamitous mistake from Ghana's IÃ±aki Williams
Mohamed Kudus scored twice for Ghana, including a stunning opener and a second goal after Egypt had equalized
Post-Match Reflections: Egypt boss Vitoria gave an update on Mohamed Salah's injury after the match
Egypt coach Vitoria said 'Let's see' when asked about Salah's condition
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mohamed Salah was forced off with an apparent hamstring issue in the first half
Egypt's Mostafa Mohamed scored the equalizing goal for Egypt in the 75th minute
Ghana's Iddrisu Baba headed wide of a gaping goal in stoppage time
Others: The match was played at the Stade Felix Houphouet-Boigny on January 18, 2024
The result means that Egypt and Ghana will both progress to the next stage of the tournament
